text: 3hours preschool programme for age 18 months to 6 years old. Strong curriculum, loving and caring teachers. Cleanliness is good and the school control the spread of viruses well, keeping parents informed of presence of viruses even from other levels. Food wise, children are exposed to junk snacks and candies from N2 level during parties and celebrations. If this is your concern, inform the class teachers.

Our students were given two days of childcare training.Despite the sudden request from Japan, the teachers at the kindergarten were very very kind to us.We are filled with gratitude.This kindergarten provides a wonderful education.
